√hīḍ 'be hostile'

present: [1.] heḍant  heḍamāna  helamāna  hīḍamāna  ahiḍat?  

perfect: jihīḍa  jīhīḍa  jihīḍé etc.  

aorist: [3.] ajīhiḍat  ajiheḍat   -- [5.] hīḍiṣātām  

[future: heḍiṣyate  heḍitā  ]

verbal: hīḍitá  

secondary: causative: heḍayant  helayām  āsa  helayate  

derivatives: hīḍá?  héḍa V.  helā E.+  -héḍana V.  helana E.+  helanīya C.  héḍas V.B.  helitavya E.
